sentences: Toidukaupade hinnad on vööndite järgi diferentseeritud. - Food prices are differentiated by region.
Palk diferentseeritakse töö keerukusest sõltuvalt. - Salary is differentiated depending on the complexity of work.
context: In Estonian, 'vahet' appears as part of compound verbs like 'vahet tegema' (to differentiate) and is used in contexts where distinguishing between different categories, levels, or types is involved. It's commonly seen in mathematical contexts (finding derivatives) but also more generally in contexts like salary differentiation based on work complexity or pricing differentiated by region.
